name: Survival game (made in 30 days)
description:
I made this game for fun for a video on my youtube channel. Go check it out if you want.


This is a simple game where you run around, mine wood, craft a pickaxe and then mine stone. It is no where near complete and has many bugs but thats what makes it all the more fun :). Also this game was made in scratch so please give it mercy XD
